Eight-Headed Hydra: Darkvision 60 ft., fast healing 18, low-light vision, scent
Nine-Headed Hydra: Darkvision 60 ft., fast healing 19, low-light vision, scent
Ten-Headed Hydra: Darkvision 60 ft., fast healing 20, low-light vision, scent

Eight-Headed Hydra: Str 19, Dex 12, Con 20, Int 2, Wis 10, Cha 9
Nine-Headed Hydra: Str 21, Dex 12, Con 20, Int 2, Wis 10, Cha 9
Ten-Headed Hydra: Str 21, Dex 12, Con 20, Int 2, Wis 10, Cha 9

Eight-Headed Hydra: Combat Reflexes B , Iron Will, Toughness, Weapon Focus (bite)
Nine-Headed Hydra: Blind-Fight, Combat Reflexes B , Iron Will, Toughness, Weapon Focus (bite)
Ten-Headed Hydra: Blind-Fight, Combat Reflexes B , Iron Will, Toughness, Weapon Focus (bite)

Eight-Headed Hydra: Temperate marshes  (Pyro: Warm marshes)  (Cryo: Cold marshes)
Nine-Headed Hydra: Temperate marshes  (Pyro: Warm marshes)  (Cryo: Cold marshes)
Ten-Headed Hydra: Temperate marshes  (Pyro: Warm marshes)  (Cryo: Cold marshes)
